p: Essential oil (0.1%) of Mexican oregano, Lippia berlandieri Schauer, in chorizo formulation improved color parameters, especially red color, browning index, textural profile analysis, and sensory characteristics. Additionally, the mesophilic microbial counts were similar for the two treatments following storage for 7Â d. Results of this study demonstrate the potential usefulness of Lippia berlandieri Schauer MOO to enhance quality, sensory characteristics, and shelf life of pork chorizo sausage.
